entry.title: [GLOBAL][Managed Kubernetes Service] Internal component maintenance
entry.content:
Apr 11, 17:12 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Apr 11, 16:01 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Apr 7, 00:48 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 11/04/2023 16:00 UTC
End time : 11/04/2023 17:00 UTC
Service impact : Public API used to managed MKS resources will still be responsive but could return some errors temporarily.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our Managed Kubernetes service, we will be doing an internal maintenance on the Kubernetes API.
This maintenance windows is scheduled to inform you that during our intervention, the Managed Kubernetes Service API used to manage the cluster lifecycle will still be reachable but could return some errors during a few seconds. No impact expected on workload deployed in MKS cluster.
